If you are a student currently planning on going to Paris to study,...
...and if you are looking for a place to stay,...
...then you might start by having a look...
...at the Cite Internationale Universitaire of Paris.
It's a huge park where no less than 5,600 students...
...can find accommodations, libraries, sports facilities, concert halls, etc.
It's a great place to visit and stay,...
...for all the 38 houses that have been built...
Have a look at their website to find out how to stay there!
